encrypted-client-hello-fallback-mechanis.userFacingDescription: This experiment enables a fallback mechanism for Encrypted Client Hello. This feature maximizes compatibility with websites that have misconfigured or unexpected DNS configurations.

fx-accounts-ping-release-rollout-2.userFacingDescription: Enable sending the Fx Accounts ping.

unified-api-for-spocs-and-top-sites-cont.userFacingName: Unified API for spocs and top sites - controlled rollout for release 133+
unified-api-for-spocs-and-top-sites-cont.userFacingDescription: We're switching to a new endpoint for the services supplying sponsored content and top sites to the new tab. This is a controlled rollout for 133 on the Release channel to that new endpoint.

long-term-holdback-2025h1-growth-desktop.userFacingDescription: Long-term holdback for 2025 H1 Growth experiments

device-migration-accounts-toolbar-icon-r.userFacingDescription: Experiment: Updating the Accounts toolbar icon

chips-rollout-to-firefox.userFacingDescription: Deploy the Partitioned cookie parameter to users

custom-wallpapers-no-message-rollout-rel.userFacingName: Custom Wallpapers, No Message Rollout - Release

spoc-positions-and-placements-rollout.userFacingDescription: For spocs and rectangle, we will update placements so they're received at once by downstream systems

storage-access-heuristic-restriction-rol.userFacingDescription: We are trying to grant fewer websites exceptions to third-party storage partitioning. We are trying this on a small fraction of users to see if it affects whether or not websites break.

desktop-release-rollout-show-relay-to-al.userFacingName: Desktop Release Rollout: Show Relay to all Browsers - "Next" Sign-up modal CTA
desktop-release-rollout-show-relay-to-al.userFacingDescription: Firefox Relay lets you hide your real email address to keep your identity safe. This study looks at how people use Relay in the Firefox browser on their computer.

report-this-ad.userFacingDescription: Implementing a feature to allow users to report objectionable ads to Mozilla.

1-callout-contextual-chatbot-suggestion-.userFacingName: 1-Callout Contextual Chatbot Suggestion Treatment A: Tab Switching Copy Rollout
1-callout-contextual-chatbot-suggestion-.userFacingDescription: Provide contextual suggestions for users who visit an AI chatbot website.

disable-enrollment-status-telemetry-for-.userFacingName: Disable Enrollment Status Telemetry for Firefox Desktop (via nimbusTelemetry)

one-click-sponsored-settings.userFacingDescription: Allow users to disable New Tab's sponsored settings in one click

fast-udp-for-firefox-treatment-fast-udp-.userFacingName: Fast UDP for Firefox - Treatment Fast UDP Release Rollout
fast-udp-for-firefox-treatment-fast-udp-.userFacingDescription: Fast UDP for Firefox's QUIC HTTP3 I/O.

enforce-crlite-results-and-limit-use-of-.userFacingDescription: CRLite is a privacy-preserving tool for checking the revocation status of TLS certificates. This rollout disables OCSP in favor of CRLite for most certificates.

visual-card-updates.userFacingDescription: Visual updates to the New Tab recommended stories and sponsored cards.

account-adoption-callout-passwords-globa.userFacingName: Account Adoption Callout Passwords - Global Rollout
account-adoption-callout-passwords-globa.userFacingDescription: Rollout:  Account Adoption Callout for Password Users

ai-chatbot-page-summarization-mvp-treatm.userFacingName: AI Chatbot Page Summarization MVP - treatment-a-callout-badge Rollout

enable-nimbus-unenrollment-synchronizati.userFacingDescription: Switch to using the shared SQL datastore for Nimbus data store.

account-adoption-pxi-menu-rollout-v2.userFacingName: Account Adoption PXI Menu - Rollout Fx143+
account-adoption-pxi-menu-rollout-v2.userFacingDescription: The rollout adds different language we could use to communicate about Mozilla Accounts, and Sync to the users within the Accounts Menu on Firefox Desktop.

pin-frequently-used-websites-143-promo-r.userFacingName: Pin Frequently Used Websites - 143 - Promo Rollout, All Locales
pin-frequently-used-websites-143-promo-r.userFacingDescription: This rollout recommends users to try out pinned tabs as a way to keep frequently used websites within reach.

context-id-rotation-every-7-days.userFacingDescription: To help further reduce long-lived unique identifiers in Firefox Desktop, we want to begin regenerating the context ID every 7 days.
